org.javaavc

Class JavaAVC

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.javaavc.JavaAVC

  • public class JavaAVC
extends java.lang.Object
    The main class of wrapper.

    Links:
    1. FFmpeg.
    2. FFmpeg FAQ.
    3. Supported File Formats, Codecs or Features -- FFmpeg Documentation.
    4. FFmpeg Support Forum.
    5. Zeranoe FFmpeg.
    6. Official FFmpeg Wiki.
    7. FFmpeg 2.0 API Doxygen.
    8. FFmpeg 2.0 Examples.
    9. An FFmpeg and SDL Tutorial by Stephen Dranger, explains how to write a video player based on FFmpeg (updated source code).
    10. FFmpeg Basics by Frantisek Korbel, describes various FFmpeg features and common tasks.
    11. FFmpeg Codec HOWTO -- MultimediaWiki.
    12. FFmpeg Filter HOWTO -- MultimediaWiki.
    13. FFmpeg Technical -- MultimediaWiki.

    Author:
    Dmitriy Zavodnikov (d.zavodnikov@gmail.com)

      • BIN_FFMPEG

        public static final java.lang.String BIN_FFMPEG
        ffmpeg is a very fast video and audio converter that can also grab from a live audio/video source. It can also convert between arbitrary sample rates and resize video on the fly with a high quality polyphase filter.

        Links:
        1. ffmpeg -- FFmpeg Documentation.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • BIN_SERVER

        public static final java.lang.String BIN_SERVER
        ffserver is a streaming server for both audio and video. It supports several live feeds, streaming from files and time shifting on live feeds.

        Links:
        1. ffserver -- FFmpeg Documentation.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • BIN_PROBE

        public static final java.lang.String BIN_PROBE
        ffprobe gathers information from multimedia streams and prints it in human- and machine-readable fashion.

        Links:
        1. ffprobe -- FFmpeg Documentation.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • commandLineExecute

        public void commandLineExecute(java.lang.String binName,
                      java.lang.String command,
                      boolean outputError)
        Execute command line of FFmpeg utils. Use BIN_* constants.
        Parameters:
        binName - Name of binary file.
        command - Command to execute.

      • commandLineExecute

        public void commandLineExecute(java.lang.String binName,
                      java.lang.String command)
        Same as commandLineExecute(String, String, boolean), but use true as output error values.
